name: Baba is WAR, a submission for Yudum 1
name_original: Baba is WAR, a submission for Yudum 1
description:
Controls:
  • Arrows or WASD to move
  • Z or F to grab in the direction you're pressing
  • R to restart stage
Mechanics:
  • Goal is to go up the stairs
  • you have 2 stats: AP and HP
  • HP is the number of hits you can take, once it hits 0 the stage resets
  • AP is how much you can move, moving without an item costs 2, moving with an item costs 3, once it dips below 0, the mobs get to move. you gain 5 ap at the start of your turn
  • you can use keys to unlock doors
  • you can use swords to kill mobs, mobs drop keys
  • have fun :)
Asset Credits:
  • Fonts by somepx
  • Sound effects made with rFXGen
